system:
note description: "Pixel buffer used for storing RGBA values." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "drawable, primitives, figures, buffer, bitmap, picture" date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"

f_make_with_size../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_make_with_sizemake_with_size (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Create pixel buffer with width a_width and height a_height. require a_width_valid: a_width > 0 a_height_valid: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_make_with_sizemake_with_size (a_width, a_height) end

f_save_to_pointer../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_save_to_pointersave_to_pointer: detachable FalseMANAGED_POINTER -- Save pixel data to Result pointer do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_save_to_pointersave_to_pointer end

f_stretched../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_stretchedstretched (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32): ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Stretched copy of Current of dimension a_width x a_height. require a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 not_locked: not ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_is_lockedis_locked do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_stretchedstretched (a_width, a_height) ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void result_not_current: Result /= Current result_width_set: Result.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width result_height_set: Result.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end

f_unlock../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_unlockunlock -- Unlock from data access with ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_pixel_iteratorpixel_iterator. do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xml#f_unlockunlock ensure not_locked: not ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_is_lockedis_locked end

f_draw_text../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_draw_textdraw_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL; a_font: ../interface/ev_font.xmlEV_FONT; a_point: ../interface/ev_coordinate.xmlEV_COORDINATE) -- Draw a_text with a_font at a_rect. require not_void: a_text /= Void not_void: a_font /= Void not_void: a_point /= Void do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_draw_textdraw_text (a_text, a_font, a_point) end
f_to_pixmap../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_to_pixmapto_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Convert to EV_PIXMAP. do create Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (Current) end
feature -- Query
f_width../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_widthwidth: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Width of Current in pixels. do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_widthwidth ensure valid_width: Result >= 0 end
f_height../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_heightheight: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Height of Current in pixels. do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_heightheight ensure valid_height: Result >= 0 end
f_area../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_areaarea: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE -- Dimension of Current as an instance of EV_RECTANGLE. do Result := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixel_buffer_i.xml#f_areaarea ensure definition: Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_xx = 0 and Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_yy = 0 and Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_widthwidth = ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_widthwidth and Result.../interface/ev_rectangle.xml#f_heightheight = ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_heightheight end

feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_interface_objects../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_create_interface_objectscreate_interface_objects -- Create objects to be used by Current in ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_initializeinitialize -- Implemented by descendants to create attached objects -- in order to adhere to void-safety due to the implementation bridge pattern. do end
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- Create implementation do create ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_makemake ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_implementationimplementation := ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation end

feature -- Obsolete
f_draw_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_draw_pixel_bufferdraw_pixel_buffer (a_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER; a_rect: ../interface/ev_rectangle.xmlEV_RECTANGLE) obsolete "Use draw_pixel_buffer_with_x_y instead [2017-05-31]" -- Draw a_pixel_buffer at a_rect. do ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_actual_implementationactual_implementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_draw_pixel_bufferdraw_pixel_buffer (a_pixel_buffer, a_rect) end
